Class CyclingInventoryMenu.ItemCycler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitRunnable
      • me.pagekite.glen3b.library.bukkit.menu.inventory.CyclingInventoryMenu.ItemCycler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    CyclingInventoryMenu

    protected class CyclingInventoryMenu.ItemCycler
extends org.bukkit.scheduler.BukkitRunnable
    Runnable that cycles through items at a specified index.
    Author:
    Glen Husman

    • Field Detail

      • _viewed

        protected org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory _viewed
        The inventory that is viewed and actually contains the cycled items.

      • _itemIndex

        protected int _itemIndex
        Item index to cycle through. In the jagged array, this is the first index.

      • _cycleNumber

        protected int _cycleNumber
        Cycle number, raw. Modulo is used by the class (to avoid runtime changes in array size).

    • Constructor Detail

                               org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory created)
        Creates an item cycler.
        Parameters:
        itemIndex - The index of the item array in the jagged array.
        created - The inventory which is being viewed.
